ModMetaData.name: Cryptorestore Caskets
ModMetaData.author: cat2002, vovik
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new Crypto Casket which features: - reverse aging and related illnesses using luciferium - stabilizes non-stable luciferium patients (pawn stays luciferium-enhanced without additction) - regrows lost organs - mentally tortures pawns! Enjoy your stay!

Credit to Allet for the art

 this is a continuation of an old mod by cat2002
